name: Aegislash
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate others. It once used its powers to force people and Pokémon to build a kingdom to its liking.

abilities.name: Stance Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch this Pokémon with an Aegislash in your hand. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gigaton Bash
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon VMAX.
